mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ass_in_out_map_Other (
group_id ,
hos_id ,
copy_code ,
ass_in_no ,
out_no ,
bill_type ,
) VALUES (
#{group_id} ,
#{hos_id} ,
#{copy_code} ,
#{ass_in_no} ,
#{out_no} ,
#{bill_type} ,
)
mapper.select: SELECT group_id, hos_id, copy_code, ass_in_no, out_no, bill_type, out_copy_code, sell_out_no FROM ass_in_out_map_Other WHERE group_id = #{group_id} and hos_id = #{hos_id} and copy_code = #{copy_code} and ass_in_no = #{ass_in_no} and out_no = #{out_no} and bill_type = #{bill_type}
